verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> he called <S%G4779><s%> his twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> together, <S%G4779><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them power <S%G1411><s%> and authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> devils, <S%G1140><s%> and to cure <S%G2323><s%> diseases. <S%G3554><s%>
And he sent <S%G649><s%> them to preach <S%G2784><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and to heal <S%G2390><s%> the sick. <S%G770><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Take <S%G142><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> for your <S%G3588><s%> journey, <S%G3598><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> staves, <S%G4464><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> money, <S%G4082><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> money; <S%G694><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> coats <S%G5509><s%> apiece. <S%G303><s%>
And whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> you enter <S%G1525><s%> into, <S%G1519><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> abide, <S%G3306><s%> and there <S%G1564><s%> depart. <S%G1831><s%>

And whoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> will not receive <S%G1209><s%> you, when you go <S%G1831><s%> out of that city, <S%G4172><s%> shake <S%G660><s%> off <S%G660><s%> the very <S%G2532><s%> dust <S%G2868><s%> from your <S%G5216><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> them.

And they departed, <S%G1831><s%> and went <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G2596><s%> the towns, <S%G2968><s%> preaching <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> and healing <S%G2323><s%> every <S%G3837><s%> where. <S%G3837><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5076><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> that was done <S%G1096><s%> by him: and he was perplexed, <S%G1280><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> that it was said <S%G3004><s%> of some, <S%G5100><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> was risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead; <S%G3498><s%>

And of some, <S%G5100><s%> that Elias <S%G2243><s%> had appeared; <S%G5316><s%> and of others, <S%G243><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> of the old <S%G744><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> was risen <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

And Herod <S%G2264><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> have I beheaded: <S%G607><s%> but who <S%G5101><s%> is this, <S%G3778><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I hear <S%G191><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> things? And he desired <S%G2212><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> him.

And the apostles, <S%G652><s%> when they were returned, <S%G5290><s%> told <S%G1334><s%> him all <S%G3745><s%> that they had done. <S%G4160><s%> And he took <S%G3880><s%> them, and went <S%G5298><s%> aside <S%G5298><s%> privately <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a desert <S%G2048><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> belonging to the city <S%G4172><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Bethsaida. <S%G966><s%>

And the people, <S%G3793><s%> when they knew <S%G1097><s%> it, followed <S%G190><s%> him: and he received <S%G1209><s%> them, and spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and healed <S%G2390><s%> them that had <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of healing. <S%G2322><s%>

And when the day <S%G2250><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to wear <S%G2827><s%> away, then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Send <S%G630><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> away, <S%G630><s%> that they may go <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the towns <S%G2968><s%> and country <S%G68><s%> round <S%G2943><s%> about, <S%G2945><s%> and lodge, <S%G2647><s%> and get <S%G2147><s%> victuals: <S%G1979><s%> for we are here <S%G5602><s%> in a desert <S%G2048><s%> place. <S%G5117><s%>

But he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Give <S%G1325><s%> you them to eat. <S%G5315><s%> And they said, <S%G2036><s%> We have <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> but five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> fishes; <S%G2486><s%> except <S%G1509><s%> we should go <S%G4198><s%> and buy <S%G59><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

For they were about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand <S%G4000><s%> men. <S%G435><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Make <S%G2625><s%> them sit <S%G2625><s%> down <S%G2625><s%> by fifties <S%G4004><s%> in a company. <S%G2828><s%>
And they did <S%G4160><s%> so, <S%G3779><s%> and made <S%G347><s%> them all <S%G537><s%> sit <S%G347><s%> down. <S%G347><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the five <S%G4002><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> fishes, <S%G2486><s%> and looking <S%G308><s%> up to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> he blessed <S%G2127><s%> them, and broke, <S%G2622><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> the multitude. <S%G3793><s%>

And they did eat, <S%G5315><s%> and were all <S%G3956><s%> filled: <S%G5526><s%> and there was taken <S%G142><s%> up of fragments <S%G2801><s%> that remained <S%G4052><s%> to them twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets. <S%G2894><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as he was alone <S%G2651><s%> praying, <S%G4336><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were with him: and he asked <S%G1905><s%> them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> that I am? <S%G1511><s%>

They answering <S%G611><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> the Baptist; <S%G910><s%> but some <S%G243><s%> say, <S%G2036><s%> Elias; <S%G2243><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> say, that one <S%G5100><s%> of the old <S%G744><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> is risen <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

He said <S%G2036><s%> to them, But whom <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> you that I am? <S%G1511><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> The Christ <S%G5547><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And he straightly charged <S%G2008><s%> them, and commanded <S%G3853><s%> them to tell <S%G2036><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> that thing;

Saying, <S%G2036><s%> The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things, and be rejected <S%G593><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%> and chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and be slain, <S%G615><s%> and be raised <S%G1453><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them all, <S%G3956><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man will <S%G2309><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> me, let him deny <S%G533><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and take <S%G142><s%> up his cross <S%G4716><s%> daily, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me.

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> shall lose <S%G622><s%> it: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> will lose <S%G622><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for my sake, <S%G1752><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> it.

For what <S%G5101><s%> is a man <S%G444><s%> advantaged, <S%G5623><s%> if he gain <S%G2770><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> and lose <S%G622><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> be cast <S%G2210><s%> away? <S%G2210><s%>

For whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall be ashamed <S%G1870><s%> of me and of my words, <S%G3056><s%> of him shall the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be ashamed, <S%G1870><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> he shall come <S%G2064><s%> in his own glory, <S%G1391><s%> and in his Father's, <S%G3962><s%> and of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels. <S%G32><s%>

But I tell <S%G3004><s%> you of a truth, <S%G230><s%> there be some <S%G5100><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall not taste <S%G1089><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> they see <S%G1492><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass about <S%G5616><s%> an eight <S%G3638><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings, <S%G3056><s%> he took <S%G3880><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> and James, <S%G2385><s%> and went <S%G305><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> to pray. <S%G4336><s%>

And as he prayed, <S%G4336><s%> the fashion <S%G1491><s%> of his countenance <S%G4383><s%> was altered, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2097><s%> and his raiment <S%G2441><s%> was white <S%G3022><s%> and glistering. <S%G1823><s%>
And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> there talked <S%G4814><s%> with him two <S%G1417><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> were Moses <S%G3475><s%> and Elias: <S%G2243><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> appeared <S%G3700><s%> in glory, <S%G1391><s%> and spoke <S%G3004><s%> of his decease <S%G1841><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he should <S%G3195><s%> accomplish <S%G4137><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> and they that were with him were heavy <S%G916><s%> with sleep: <S%G5258><s%> and when they were awake, <S%G1235><s%> they saw <S%G1492><s%> his glory, <S%G1391><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> that stood <S%G4921><s%> with him.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as they departed <S%G1316><s%> from him, Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> it is good <S%G2570><s%> for us to be here: <S%G5602><s%> and let us make <S%G4160><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> tabernacles; <S%G4633><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> for you, and one <S%G3391><s%> for Moses, <S%G3475><s%> and one <S%G3391><s%> for Elias: <S%G2243><s%> not knowing <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he said. <S%G3004><s%>

While he thus <S%G5023><s%> spoke, <S%G3004><s%> there came <S%G1096><s%> a cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and overshadowed <S%G1982><s%> them: and they feared <S%G5399><s%> as they entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the cloud. <S%G3507><s%>
And there came <S%G1096><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> out of the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is my beloved <S%G27><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> him.

And when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> was past, <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%> And they kept <S%G4601><s%> it close, <S%G4601><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> any <S%G3762><s%> of those things which <S%G3739><s%> they had seen. <S%G3708><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that on <S%G1722><s%> the next <S%G1836><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> when they were come <S%G2718><s%> down <S%G2718><s%> from the hill, <S%G3735><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> people <S%G3793><s%> met <S%G4876><s%> him.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> of the company <S%G3793><s%> cried <S%G310><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> I beseech <S%G1189><s%> you, look <S%G1914><s%> on my son: <S%G5207><s%> for he is my <S%G3427><s%> only <S%G3439><s%> child. <S%G3439><s%>

And, see, <S%G2400><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> takes <S%G2983><s%> him, and he suddenly <S%G1810><s%> cries <S%G2896><s%> out; and it tears <S%G4682><s%> him that he foams <S%G876><s%> again, <S%G3326><s%> and bruising <S%G4937><s%> him hardly <S%G3425><s%> departs <S%G672><s%> from him.
And I sought <S%G1189><s%> your disciples <S%G3101><s%> to cast <S%G1544><s%> him out; and they could <S%G1410><s%> not.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> O faithless <S%G571><s%> and perverse <S%G1294><s%> generation, <S%G1074><s%> how <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G2193><s%> shall I be with you, and suffer <S%G430><s%> you? Bring <S%G4317><s%> your son <S%G5207><s%> here. <S%G5602><s%>

And as he was yet <S%G2089><s%> a coming, <S%G4334><s%> the devil <S%G1140><s%> threw <S%G4952><s%> him down, and tare <S%G4952><s%> him. And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and healed <S%G2390><s%> the child, <S%G3816><s%> and delivered <S%G591><s%> him again <S%G591><s%> to his father. <S%G3962><s%>

And they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the mighty <S%G3168><s%> power <S%G3168><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> But while they wondered <S%G2296><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G3956><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

Let these <S%G5128><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> sink <S%G5087><s%> down into <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ears: <S%G3775><s%> for the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be delivered <S%G3860><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>

But they understood <S%G50><s%> not this <S%G5127><s%> saying, <S%G4487><s%> and it was hid <S%G3871><s%> from them, that they perceived <S%G143><s%> it not: and they feared <S%G5399><s%> to ask <S%G2065><s%> him of that saying. <S%G4487><s%>
Then <S%G1161><s%> there arose <S%G1525><s%> a reasoning <S%G1261><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them, which <S%G5101><s%> of them should be greatest. <S%G3187><s%>
And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> perceiving <S%G1492><s%> the thought <S%G1261><s%> of their heart, <S%G2588><s%> took <S%G1949><s%> a child, <S%G3813><s%> and set <S%G2476><s%> him by him,

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall receive <S%G1209><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> child <S%G3813><s%> in my name <S%G3686><s%> receives <S%G1209><s%> me: and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall receive <S%G1209><s%> me receives <S%G1209><s%> him that sent <S%G649><s%> me: for he that is least <S%G3398><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you all, <S%G3956><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall be great. <S%G3173><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Master, <S%G1988><s%> we saw <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G5100><s%> casting <S%G1544><s%> out devils <S%G1140><s%> in your name; <S%G3686><s%> and we forbade <S%G2967><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> he follows <S%G190><s%> not with us.
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Forbid <S%G2967><s%> him not: for he that is not against <S%G2596><s%> us is for us.

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> the time <S%G2250><s%> was come <S%G4845><s%> that he should be received <S%G354><s%> up, he steadfastly <S%G4741><s%> set <S%G4741><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%>

And sent <S%G649><s%> messengers <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> his face: <S%G4383><s%> and they went, <S%G4198><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a village <S%G2968><s%> of the Samaritans, <S%G4541><s%> to make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> for him.
And they did not receive <S%G1209><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> was as though he would go <S%G4198><s%> to Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

And when his disciples <S%G3101><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> this, they said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you that we command <S%G2036><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> to come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and consume <S%G355><s%> them, even <S%G2532><s%> as Elias <S%G2243><s%> did? <S%G4160><s%>
But he turned, <S%G4762><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> You know <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G3634><s%> manner <S%G3634><s%> of spirit <S%G4151><s%> you are of.
